title: 4.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Analyze the model according to the following cases:
Case 1: Use only one image of a student to train the model. Test it and check the output.
Case 2: Use the same image of a student 15 times to train the model. Test it with a different image of the student and check the output.
Compare the accuracy of the model in both the cases

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
